column5:
This innovative new MSc Infection Prevention & Control (Online) course is offered by the
              
               School of Public Health
              
              in collaboration with other schools across University College Cork, including the
              
               Cork University Business School
              
              , and the
              
               School of Microbiology
              
              .
column7: The EU fee for this course is €5,600 The Non-EU fee for this course is €6,850
